summary: Fix TOCTOU race condition in load() by checking actual bytes read instead of stat()

changes.src/flywheel/storage.py: Modified load() to read content first, then check size of actual bytes read instead of using stat()
changes.tests/test_storage_toctou.py: Added new test file with 5 tests for TOCTOU race condition

risks: None - fix is minimal and backwards compatible
limitations: None - the fix addresses the root cause of the TOCTOU race
